courseTitle: Prompt Engineering for Designers and Writers
overview:
The course should teach how to craft effective prompts to generate visual art, stories, ads, or product ideas using AI tools like ChatGPT, MidJourney, and DALL·E.
Explain prompt structure, specificity, constraints, and iteration.
Focus on creativity, tone, and clarity — no coding involved.
Include visual vs. textual prompt differences, with demos in each module.
Each lesson should have examples, comparison outputs, and prompt-improvement tasks.
Include real-world creative challenges: storyboarding, branding, UI mockups, etc.
audience: Content creators, writers, marketers, and visual designers.

modules.description: This module introduces the core concepts of prompt engineering, its importance in AI-driven creative processes, and the tools we'll be using. It's crucial for understanding the foundation of effective prompt creation.

submodules.name: Submodule 1.1: What is Prompt Engineering?
submodules.description: Defining prompt engineering, its role in AI, and its applications in design and writing.
submodules.summary: Prompt engineering is crafting effective instructions for AI models.

options: Generating desired outputs from AI models
quiz.answer: Generating desired outputs from AI models
